scripts.deploy-test: graph codegen && graph build && graph create --node https://backuptest.argofinance.money/upload argo/argopetz && graph deploy --ipfs https://ipfs.argofinance.money/ --node https://backuptest.argofinance.money/upload argo/argopetz -l v1.0.0
scripts.deploy-prod: graph codegen && graph build && graph create --node https://backup.argofinance.money/upload argo/petz && graph deploy --ipfs https://ipfs.argofinance.money/ --node https://backup.argofinance.money/upload argo/argopetz -l v1.0.0
